com.whitecanyongames.engine.camera

Class FreeCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whitecanyongames.engine.camera.FreeCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Camera

    public class FreeCamera
extends java.lang.Object
implements Camera
    A 3D free moving camera Pitch represents the rotation around the x axis Yaw represents rotation around the y axis Roll represents rotation around the z axis dx (opposite side) = hypotenuse(distance) * sin(theta (x rotation)) dz (adjacent side) = hypotenuse(distance) * cos(theta (x rotation))
    Since:
    0.0.4
    Version:
    1.3
    Author:
    Lane
